issue.title: justdoelectronics.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://justdoelectronics.com/digital-temperature-monitoring-with-ds18b20-sensor-arduino/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjustdoelectronics.com%2Fdigital-temperature-monitoring-with-ds18b20-sensor-arduino%2F) ### Comment > Site is detecting Adblocking and asking to disable, working fine if Adguard is disabled, > > Attached related image with and without Adguard Username: `@Merchant007` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/h3heb6oewhs00gccc4wks4s8c4c0gkwnjjn1bgyreo.png?nc=1)
